mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reserve r INNER JOIN doctors d ON r.doctor_no = d.doctor_no INNER JOIN users u ON r.user_no = u.user_no AND d.doctor_no = #{doctorNo}
SELECT r.* , (SELECT user_name FROM users WHERE user_no = r.doctor_no) AS doctor_name FROM reserve r INNER JOIN users u ON r.user_no = u.user_no WHERE u.user_no = #{userNo} AND r.status = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reserve (user_no, doctor_no, medical_department, reserve_time, symptom, status) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{doctorNo}, #{medicalDepartment}, #{reserveTime}, #{symptom}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT reserve_id as reserveId, user_no as userNo, doctor_no as doctorNo, medical_department, reserve_time, symptom, status FROM reserve
SELECT reserve_id as reserveId, user_no as userNo, doctor_no as doctorNo, medical_department, reserve_time, symptom, status FROM reserve WHERE reserve_id = #{reserveId}
